name: Ultimate Kick Ball
description:
Ultimate Kick Ball is my take on the classic childhood game of don't let the balloon touch the ground!

Kick the ball around to get more points, the faster the better! Hitting walls and redirecting orbs get you more points too by increasing your multiplier.

Keep the ball alive! Make sure it never touches the ground, or you lose.

Credits:
